accountType

Class Savings

  • java.lang.Object
    • accounts.Account
      • accountType.Savings
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MoneyMarket

    public class Savings
extends Account
    The Savings class extends from the Account class to give specifics for Savings Accounts. Holds information such as the holder, the account balance, and whether it is closed or not. It can give information such as fees or monthly interest for a Savings Account as well as state if the holder is a loyal customer or not.
    Author:
    Jah C. Speed, Abe Vitangcol

    • Constructor Detail

      • Savings

        public Savings(Profile holder,
               double balance,
               boolean loyalCustomer)
        Constructs a Savings Account with a holder, balance, and details if this is closed or loyal or not. See the parent class, Account, for the list of abstract methods and instance variables.
        Parameters:
        holder - The person who is holding this account. balance The balance of this account. loyalCustomer Whether the customer is loyal or not, which affects interest rates.

    • Method Detail

      • fee

        public double fee()
        Returns the fee of the account.
        Specified by:
        fee in class Account
        Returns:
        0 if the account is at least the balance threshold, 6 otherwise.

      • getType

        public java.lang.String getType()
        Returns the kind of account this account is.
        Specified by:
        getType in class Account
        Returns:
        "Savings" in a string format.

      • isLoyalCustomer

        public boolean isLoyalCustomer()
        Returns whether this account has a loyal customer or not.
        Returns:
        The boolean instance variable, loyalCustomer.

      • monthlyInterest

        public double monthlyInterest()
        Returns the monthly interest rate of the account.
        Specified by:
        monthlyInterest in class Account
        Returns:
        The loyal monthly interest rate if the holder is loyal, the regular interest rate otherwise.

      • setLoyalCustomer

        public void setLoyalCustomer(boolean value)
        Changes the status of this account to be a loyal customer or not a loyal one.
        Parameters:
        value - Whether this customer is a loyal customer or not.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Uses the Account method to make this account into a readable string.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Account
        Returns:
        The account type in the form of "Type::Holder::Balance $####.00::(CLOSED if closed)" along with whether this account is loyal or not.
